summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FundFlow authentication system. All backend API endpoints and frontend authentication flows are working correctly.
passed_tests: POST /api/auth/register - Creates user and returns JWT token
POST /api/auth/login - Authenticates user and returns JWT token
GET /api/auth/me - Returns current user with valid token
POST /api/collections - Correctly requires authentication (401 without token)
Protected route /create - Redirects to /login when not authenticated
Registration form - All fields present with proper validation
Login form - All fields present with proper validation
User menu dropdown - Appears after login with logout option
Create page access - Available after authentication
Logout functionality - Properly clears session and shows auth buttons
All basic API endpoints (categories, stats, collections) working
Payment order creation and verification working
